summary: Soul Songs
title: Soul Songs
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2G8tgmK

by Phandiction

It was said that only by the voice of a songbird could a human truly ever come to know themselves. It was said that everyone had a specific melody and when a songbird sung yours, for the first time you would be completely understood and entirely loved. You would be forever entranced with inner peace caused by the absolute perception of your own being, and therefore that of others.

Dan is a songbird, purchased by the king and cared for by the kings very own messenger, Phil.

body:
I have posted the first chapter to my Songbird AU fic. I’m temporary named it Soul Songs. Haven’t thought of a name I really like yet. I have the link below, although when I get a few more chapters posted I’ll create a real post for the story. Thanks to those of you who ahve really encouraged me to write this and I hope you enjoy this opening chapter to set the stage!

summary: why ppl are asking for money on #pinof 10? i'm like really confused?

summary: 1. i don't get the 'the fear of being open is fading' thing or whatever people who're convinced dnp are together think. firstly,...
question: 1. i don't get the 'the fear of being open is fading' thing or whatever people who're convinced dnp are together think. firstly, they make sure people know they have separate rooms/beds, both in their own apartment and each time they travel, secondly, phil manually takes down 'phan proof' to this day, thirdly, dan got obviously uncomfortable when phannies assumed his last solo video was him coming out and/or him admitting that he sucks phil's dick.
answer:
“2. they have ALWAYS (even back in 2009) referred to each other stricltly as best friends. and sorry but you kind of have to say that you’re dating someone if you want people to know about it lol clearly dnp don’t want that, though, or they’re simply not together. they don’t talk about their love lives for a reason, but the entire phandom feels like they have the right to discuss their relationship and label them anyway”


…


“You kind of have to say you’re dating somebody if you want people to know about it” YES.


I think the Phandom tries to make it a homophobia thing. Like “straight people don’t have to tell you they’re a couple you can just figure it out.” But that’s really… not it. You shouldn’t ever assume that two people are a couple if they haven’t actually said that they are. Regardless of gender or orientation. It’s not because Dan and Phil are both dudes, it’s because it’s weird to assume that you know more about someone’s love life than what they’ve actually told you.


Like, this is basically the grown up version of when your mom convinces herself that your male friend must be your boyfriend, or someone you have a crush on. You don’t know the state of someone’s relationship at first glance.

reblog.comment:
“2. they have ALWAYS (even back in 2009) referred to each other stricltly as best friends. and sorry but you kind of have to say that you’re dating someone if you want people to know about it lol clearly dnp don’t want that, though, or they’re simply not together. they don’t talk about their love lives for a reason, but the entire phandom feels like they have the right to discuss their relationship and label them anyway”


…


“You kind of have to say you’re dating somebody if you want people to know about it” YES.


I think the Phandom tries to make it a homophobia thing. Like “straight people don’t have to tell you they’re a couple you can just figure it out.” But that’s really… not it. You shouldn’t ever assume that two people are a couple if they haven’t actually said that they are. Regardless of gender or orientation. It’s not because Dan and Phil are both dudes, it’s because it’s weird to assume that you know more about someone’s love life than what they’ve actually told you.


Like, this is basically the grown up version of when your mom convinces herself that your male friend must be your boyfriend, or someone you have a crush on. You don’t know the state of someone’s relationship at first glance.

trail.content_raw:
“2. they have ALWAYS (even back in 2009) referred to each other stricltly as best friends. and sorry but you kind of have to say that you’re dating someone if you want people to know about it lol clearly dnp don’t want that, though, or they’re simply not together. they don’t talk about their love lives for a reason, but the entire phandom feels like they have the right to discuss their relationship and label them anyway”


…
